fields.description: While working on YARN-1011, I noticed the aggregate container utilization the NM reports to RM can be negative (CPU). This is likely because of UNAVAILABLE CPU usage information.
fields.summary: Aggregate container utilization can be negative

comments.body: Simple patch that just skips monitoring usage for a container if CPU usage is negative, as this likely means container just started.
